Join Our Discord!

Connect with fellow adventurers and get the latest updates on Sinbad as we journey through development! The Discord link can be found on the right of this description, or in the forum section!

Description

Sinbad is a charming 3D sandbox platformer inspired by the tales of A Thousand and One Arabian Nights and games like Super Mario and A Hat in Time.

In this whimsical adventure, you play as Sinbad, a young boy from Basra who unwittingly becomes entangled in a magical mystery. After a strange explosion in the market, Sinbad discovers that a magical tapestry, meant to be a gift for the Sultan, has been torn into pieces by a panicked cat. These magical fabric fragments are scattered across town and into hidden pocket dimensions, and it's up to Sinbad to restore them.

(Scissors WIP!)

Armed with a pair of magical scissors, Sinbad embarks on a quest to collect the pieces, solve puzzles, and repair the tapestry. Along the way, he gains new abilities by collecting crystals scattered throughout the town, helping him cut through the fabric of space and time.

Explore colorful levels, complete side quests, and uncover the mysteries of the tapestry. Can Sinbad restore the fabric and save the day? Complete every quest, and you'll discover a special change to the final piece of the tapestry.
